description: This file defines a React functional component 'TemplateSelect' that presents a UI for selecting between two SOW (Statement of Work) templates: Fixed Price and Time & Material. It uses props for selected state and onChange handler, and renders buttons with descriptive text and styling indicating the active selection.

methods.name: TemplateSelect({ selected, onChange })
methods.description: React functional component for selecting SOW templates, rendering options as buttons with dynamic styling based on selection.
